title: I just got to ask (about the client)
body: is it just me or the client lately takes ABSURD amount of memory/ram?? it's only the past few weeks. whats going on is it just me?

replies.body: Mine's not using more than 1GB, so I don't see any issues with it. Can you confirm how much yours is using with [a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of what you're seeing?
It's been the same for me as ever.
